long_description: This cutting-edge cooking pot design for Jetboil(R) stoves offers additional capacity and versatility for larger group outings and meals. Partnered with the Jetboil(R) Personal Cooking System, pot support and stabilizer, it creates a full Group Cooking System--a great upgrade! Large 1.5-liter (1.6 quart) capacity easily handles larger cooking requirements; hard-anodized for durability. Innovative FluxRing(TM) heat exchanger technology at bottom of pot increases stove efficiency and provides even heating. Outer neoprene pot cozy wraps pot for enhanced heat retention and efficiency; silicone-coated fold-out bail handles allow burn-free handling. Durable plastic lid and bottom casing cover pot contents and protect FluxRing(TM); stove base, pot support and stabilizer can store neatly inside.
short_description: This cutting-edge cooking pot design for Jetboil(R) stoves offers additional capacity and versatility for larger group outings and meals.
